Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 3:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

Visibility: 24 km

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers with risk of a thunderstorm. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
